metadata.name: Candid Prelude
metadata.description:
On a hot week of summer gifted with a great set of natural lighting this session took place with the usual carefree and spontaneous approach. 

The undeniable chemistry between camera and model was all around the premises, on an at ease state of mind. A singular glance of everyday intimacy unfolded beyond our expectations. 

The Canon AE-1 with the perfect match of the Kodak Portra 400 completed the essential set to register this unique statement on the value of analog photography into the blockchain era.

This collection of shots represents a great collaboration on the real power of film photography and the assertion of it as an artform.

Shot on Canon AE-1 - 35mm Kodak Portra 400 / 2021.
